get.summary: Get information about available file parsers

post.summary: Parse a file from a local path

parameters.name: render_markdown
parameters.description: Render Markdown output if true (optional, default false)

post.summary: Parse a local file and stream Markdown
Parse a file from a URL

parameters.name: render_markdown
parameters.description: Render Markdown output if true (optional, default false)

post.summary: Parse a file from a URL and stream Markdown

parameters.name: render_markdown
parameters.description: Render Markdown output if true (optional, default false)

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Optional original filename (used to determine file type if Content-Type is ambiguous)

post.summary: Upload and parse a file, streaming Markdown

requestBody.description: File to parse and stream as Markdown (expects field 'file' with file data)

get.description: Get a list of all nodes in the deployment. Use ?details=true to include sysinfo and syscap. Use ?force_refresh=true to invalidate syscap cache.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Include detailed system information and capabilities

parameters.name: force_refresh
parameters.description: Force refresh syscap, ignoring cache (only applies when details=true)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific node. Use ?details=true to include sysinfo and syscap. Use ?force_refresh=true to invalidate syscap cache.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Include detailed system information and capabilities

parameters.name: force_refresh
parameters.description: Force refresh syscap, ignoring cache (only applies when details=true)

get.description: Get system capabilities (hardware, software features) for a specific node. Use ?force_refresh=true to invalidate cache and refresh all capabilities.

parameters.name: force_refresh
parameters.description: Force refresh all syscap, ignoring cache and TTL

get.description: Get detailed system information (OS, CPU, memory, etc.) for a specific node
Retrieve settings for the authenticated user

post.description: Full update of user settings (POST semantics)

patch.description: Partial update of user settings (PATCH semantics)

get.description: List registered GTS entities with optional filtering by pattern, kind, vendor, package, or namespace.

parameters.name: pattern
parameters.description: Wildcard pattern for GTS ID matching (e.g., gts.acme.*)

post.description: Register one or more GTS entities (types or instances) in batch. Returns per-item results.

get.description: Retrieve a single GTS entity by its identifier.
Retrieve a paginated list of cities using cursor-based pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of cities to return

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
OData v4 filter expression
- id: eq|ne|in
- name: eq|ne|contains|startswith|endswith|in
- country: eq|ne|contains|startswith|endswith|in
- created_at: eq|ne|gt|ge|lt|le|in

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description:
OData v4 orderby expression
- id asc
- id desc
- name asc
- name desc
- country asc
- country desc
- created_at asc
- created_at desc

post.description: Create a new city with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve a specific city by UUID

patch.description: Partially update a city with the provided fields

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of users using cursor-based pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of users to return

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
OData v4 filter expression
- id: eq|ne|in
- email: eq|ne|contains|startswith|endswith|in
- created_at: eq|ne|gt|ge|lt|le|in

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description:
OData v4 orderby expression
- id asc
- id desc
- email asc
- email desc
- created_at asc
- created_at desc

post.description: Create a new user with the provided information

get.description: Real-time stream of user events as Server-Sent Events
Retrieve a specific user by their UUID

delete.description: Delete a user by their UUID

patch.description: Partially update a user with the provided fields

get.description: Retrieve the address for a specific user

put.description: Create or replace the address for a specific user

delete.description: Delete the address for a specific user

CreateCityReq.description: REST DTO for creating a new city

CreateUserReq.description: REST DTO for creating a new user

id.description: Optional ID for the user. If not provided, a UUID v7 will be generated

FileParserInfoDto.description: REST DTO for file parser info response

GtsEntityDto.description: Response DTO for a GTS entity.

content.description: The entity content (schema for types, object for instances).

id.description: Deterministic UUID generated from the GTS ID.

is_schema.description:
Whether this entity is a schema (type definition).

- `true`: This is a type definition (GTS ID ends with `~`)
- `false`: This is an instance (GTS ID does not end with `~`)

segments.description: All parsed segments from the GTS ID.

GtsIdSegmentDto.description: DTO for a GTS ID segment.

type_name.description: Type name component of the segment.

ip_addresses.description: All detected IP addresses. The first one is the primary IP (used for default route).

InlineStyleDto.description: REST DTO for inline text styling

ListEntitiesResponse.description: Response DTO for listing GTS entities.

ParseLocalFileRequest.description: REST DTO for parse local file request

ParseUrlRequest.description: REST DTO for parse URL request

ParsedDocMetadataDto.description: REST DTO for parsed document metadata

ParsedDocResponseDto.description: REST DTO for file parse response (with optional markdown)

document.description: The parsed document in intermediate representation

Problem.title: Problem
Problem.description: RFC 9457 Problem Details for HTTP APIs

code.description: Optional machine-readable error code defined by the application.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.

status.description:
The HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem.
Serializes as u16 for RFC 9457 compatibility.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

trace_id.description: Optional trace id useful for tracing.

type.description:
A URI reference that identifies the problem type.
When dereferenced, it might provide human-readable documentation.

PutAddressReq.description: REST DTO for creating/upserting an address

RegisterEntitiesRequest.description: Request DTO for registering GTS entities.

entities.description: Array of GTS entities to register.

results.description: Results for each entity in the request.

gts_id.description: The GTS ID that was attempted, if available.

RegisterResultDto.description: Result of registering a single entity.

RegisterSummaryDto.description: Summary of a batch registration operation.

fetched_at_secs.description: When this capability was last fetched (Unix timestamp in seconds)

UpdateCityReq.description: REST DTO for updating a city (partial)

UpdateUserReq.description: REST DTO for updating a user (partial)

UserDto.description: REST DTO for user representation with serde/utoipa

ValidationViolation.title: ValidationViolation
ValidationViolation.description: Individual validation violation for a specific field or property.

message.description: Human-readable message describing the validation error
